package.name: Amber

dependencies.package: mobilesubstrate, preferenceloader, firmware (>= 7.0), gsc.camera-flash, firmware (>= 11.0) | com.a3tweaks.flipswitch, firmware (<< 11.0) | com.opa334.ccsupport

package.shortDescription: The tweak changes the operation of the yellow LED flash, or both the white and yellow LED's. Activation from the button in the Control Center.

descriptionlist.description: This is an package will full depictions.

changelog.change: Support for devices with 4 LED's on ios13.
The ability to override the settings of the Flashlight system application.
